title: I can't Handle this Game any More & Here's Why!
body:
Promo time, yup here we go again this is my second thread on this rubbish. I'm sure anyone (which would be 99.9999% of us) have been in a promo series you sit there asking yourself wtf have u done wrong to deserve such retarded team mates. Well here's my story and why it's so hard to climb.

Was roughly sitting at 70% win rate, so I hit promo's rather easily.

Win my first game rather casually and easily no sweat, things are looking good. Then came games 2 and 3.

Game 2. Winning comfortably that's until Rammus decided he need a break. Goes AFK between the 15-20 min mark. Just sitting in the fountain. Comes back for about 10 secs for what I assume is to reset the afk timer (wasn't really watching him) and then goes AFK again between the 20-28 minute mark. Doing it rough in a 4v5 but not losing many objectives. Now the ONLY fed person on their team is a Teemo. Rammus comes back after his break and you think he'd buy ANY sort of magic resist? Nope, 4 armor items is is and then decided he's just going to roll around the map, farm and ignore everyone else. We lose, ggwp.

So shit, here I am one win one loss things are looking shaky. No problem, new game, report the afk'r and I'm still with a chance. Then Riot MM happens. I get paired WITH THE SAME GUY! Fuck me right! Honestly, are u just trying to bust my balls Riot?

But there's a kicker! There's and even bigger douche in this game and unfortunately he's on my team.

Game 3. Starts out alright during lane phase but clearly my ADC is slightly retarded and is playing an immobile champ. We lose 1st tower so what does he decide to do? Constantly push out bot lane without warding at all against a Twitch who cloaks, runs up to him and melts his face. He's down 0-2 at this point and now has the shits. I kindly ask him not to push out so far with limited vision since Twitch has done the same thing twice. So you know what his mentality is? To intent feed and troll. Yup! Lovely isn't it? Stuff up and get rekt from your own mistakes and then make everyone else pay merely because they suggested you stop what you are doing and getting killed from. I mean I thought he would have learnt from the 1st time he got killed but nope.

So all game this asswipe runs around doing his thing not really helping anyone or doing anything. Every time he dies he makes a smartass comment and thinks it's amusing.

How is this a reflection on my performance and my abilities and how is it fair that people miss out on promotions purely because the OCE server is filled with asswipes? Also why is it only when you hit promo's you end up with the BIGGEST trolls and butthurt salty noobs ever?

TLDR, easily hit promo's only to be hit with an AFK'r and paired with an intent feeder who's butthurt he got solo killed twice in the same spot.

GG Riot, well played!

/rant.

replies.body: Welcome to OCE. Where skill level disparity is ridiculous thanks to last year's dynamic queue. Where smurfs pretend to be diamond but haven't got a basic clue about map rotations or macro play. Where the queue timers are high because we can't afford to have two queues. And where people think they are good but can really just delete three tiers from their current rank for a reality check.
I still don't know why Season 6 wasn't just deleted from everyone's rank for the season so that it was fixed.
Yeah that would be the right way to go, but I guess they didn't want to admit they messed up with dynamic queue.

Well to be fair what were the odds on being paired with that guy and I did have a few minute break between those 2 games. Enough to go get a drink and use the bathroom. Guess he done the same thing. The third game it wasn't even him doing the trolling tho. To be fair he was dicking about but still trying. It was the other asswipe who decided he'd had enough of getting solo'd by Twitch and to take it out on the entire team by trolling (seems to be the norm on OCE server).

Let's just have a sit, relax, and play more Normals.

Or you could also just play Ranked like Normals instead of trying to climb, assuming you don't just go fuck all and ruin everybody else's game that is.
If you wanna climb it's gotta be a 1v5 situation. If your better than the rank you are at you can't rely on people who are worse then you.

If it makes you feel any better, I'm a support main, and my provisional series I managed to get all of them so I was happy. Won my first 4, had a great KDA around 8, kill participation around 80% with a tonne of wards and high damage and gold so I was looking at this stage realistically at a gold, maybe if I'm lucky a plat ranking (according to lolsumo I had a master, diamond, and two plat performances)

Then shit hit the fan.

My next game was against diamonds and plats, and my team were bronze and silver. You can imagine my heartbreak when first blood is given up on the first wave of minions  with 3 following in quick succession across the board, my adc constantly out of position unable to do anything but stand still while he cs'd.

I get 90% kill participation, during the early game having a 5 kda before the overflow effect comes around to get me, and unfortunately netting myself a silver performance.

same again for the next one. I don't win any of my remaining 6 games but get performance ratings pf diamond, 4 gold and unfortunately another silver. I averaged out my performances and had an average of over 70% kill participation, 4 kda, higher than average gold, around 40 wards per game (I get shit tonnes of control wards as well) and, as a full suupport 5 of those last 6 games I had the highest damage to champs on the team.

Yet, in the infinite wisdom of the RIOT system, I get bronze 1 because my teams are shithouse. Just to add insult to injury, LOLKing has my elo showing as a mid silver.

In times like this I most certainly relate with the sentiment, Fuck you Rito....

Really that third game was your own fault.

If you get a feeder/AFKer in your game, you should wait a period before queuing again or risk being matched with them again.
